Fury of Heur-Ket.name: Fury of Heur-Ket
Fury of Heur-Ket.flavor: You focus your fragment of the essence of Heur-Ket into a wind that surrounds you, gives your movement flight, and grants windswept strength to your melee attacks.
Fury of Heur-Ket.effect: Until the stance ends, gain a fly speed equal to your land speed (hover), and when you hit an adjacent enemy with a melee attack, you can choose to push it a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier or knock it prone.
